'''Illaria''' is a mentioned character in ''Genshin Impact''. She was mentioned in {{Quest|Ever-Surging Memories}}.

==Profile==
Illaria was the little sister of [[Vautrin]]. She passed away when she was young. Vautrin described her to be very similar to [[Carole]] in personality: kind, innocent, and believes the best in people, which made her vulnerable to deception and betrayal.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Ever-Surging Memories}}</ref>
